I am Ben Bleikamp. I am from Ohio, I live San Francisco, and a I’m designer at GitHub.

Contact me

I respond to almost every tweet: @bleikamp

Stuff I Use

  • Burritos
  • Coffee
  • A 15" MacBook Pro with 8GB of RAM and a big SSD. It is often hooked up to a 27" Apple Cinema Display. Facebook loads so fucking fast.
  • I play Scramble with Friends on an iPhone.
  • An iPad. It’s the 3rd version. Their naming system is stupid.
  • I participate in The Cloud™ with Dropbox
  • I back up worry-free to BackBlaze
  • Wrinkle free shirts via a Rowenta iron
  • Filtered photos via Instagram

Professional

In the past I’ve worked at companies like Yelp and Bleacher Report. I’ve helped authors like Ramit Sethi and Tim Ferriss launch their blogs and NYT best-selling books. And I’ve worked with companies like LinkedIn, Mint, and SEOmoz.

I love to build things that people enjoy using. The Internet is a fantastic place to do that.
